meta.title: Avatar
meta.description: Avatars are typically used to display a user profile as a picture, an icon, or short text.

props.description: Value to place in the 'alt' attribute for image and icon avatars
When `true` shows an empty badge on the avatar, alternatively set to a string for content in the badge
When `true` places the badge at the left instead of the right
CSS length to offset the badge. Positive values move the badge inwards, while negative values move the badge outwards
When `true` places the badge at the top instead of the bottom
Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the badge
When set to `true`, renders the avatar as a button
Type of button to render (i.e. `button`, `submit`, `reset`). Has no effect if prop button is not set
Icon name to use for the avatar. Must be all lowercase. Defaults to `person-fill` if `text` or `src` props not provided
Specifies the type of rounding to apply to the avatar. The `square` prop takes precedence. Refer to the documentation for details
Size of the avatar. Refer to the documentation for details
Disables rounding of the avatar, rending the avatar with square corners
Image URL to use for the avatar
Text to place in the avatar
Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component

slots.name: badge
slots.description: Content to place in the avatars optional badge. Overrides the `badge` prop

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the avatar. Overrides props `text`, `src`, and `icon-name`

events.description: Emitted when the avatar is clicked when rendered as a button or link. Not emitted otherwise
Emitted if an image `src` is provided and the image fails to load

props.description: Floating point number specifying the amount of overlap where `0` is no overlap and `1` is 100% overlap
Specifies the type of rounding to apply to the child avatars. The `square` prop takes precedence. Refer to the documentation for details
Size of all the child avatars. Refer to the documentation for details
Disables rounding of the child avatars, rendering each avatar with square corners
Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to all child avatars

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content (avatars) to place in the avatar group
